conclusion: Determine the electric power P consumed by the circuit when the switch is closed and compare it to 15 W.
Determine the voltage U when the switch is open.
Calculate voltage U using Ohm's law: U = I_0 x R_1 = 10 V.
Determine the current when the switch is closed.
Calculate total resistance R_total for parallel resistances: R_total = 6.67 Î©.
Calculate total current I using Ohm's law: I = 1.5 A.
Calculate the electric power P consumed by the circuit.
Calculate electric power P: P = U x I = 15 W.
The electric power P consumed by the circuit when the switch is closed is exactly 15 W.
